guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

body:
tfw someone kicked every single post from +banned and i still have to deal with the yanking even though i did nothing wrong there ;(((

(In other words, those who post in +general aren't the only ones being affected by the yanking problem.)

Context: in the discord, acikek is very outspoken about being against a way to prevent yanking

GM abuse exists. They can kick content even if it is 100% on topic. The guild I mentioned was taken over after the original GM was banned.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
tfw someone kicked every single post from +BANNED and i still have to deal with the yanking even though i did nothing wrong there ;(((

(In other words, those who post in +general aren't the only ones being affected by the yanking problem.)

Context: in the discord, acikek is very outspoken about being against a way to prevent yanking

GM abuse exists. They can kick content even if it is 100% on topic. The guild I mentioned was taken over after the original GM was banned.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
Idk you tell me, my comments and posts arent private.
  
Look man, im happier than most, and i try to spread it here and take out my anger on those that arent helping.  
  
Mr robocop ,happens to be unconductive to a thinking society. He has the right to an opinion and share it. I have the right to be an ass every time he does. Welcome to freedom friend. Where even those you think you dont like...you sorta do, they serve a purpose.

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs
